title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4242.9 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4242.9 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) An application
fee of $250 must be paid to the corporation for projects involving the
acquisition, construction, reconstruction, rehabilitation, alteration or
improvement of real property, the financing of machinery and equipment and
working capital loans and loan guarantees before final review of an application
can be completed. This fee will be refunded in the event the application is
withdrawn or rejected. (b) The
corporation will assess a commitment fee of two percent of the amount of any
program loan involving the acquisition, construction, reconstruction, rehabilitation, alteration or improvement of real property, the financing of
machinery and equipment and working capital, payable upon acceptance of
commitment. No portion of the commitment fee will be repaid if the commitment
lapses and/or the project does not close. (c) Applicants for program assistance will be
responsible for expenses incurred by the corporation in connection with the
project, including, without limitation, expenses related to appraisals, surveys, title insurance, credit searches, filing fees, public hearing expenses
and other requirements deemed appropriate by the
corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

4242.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
